Name: tgrelid
column6: the table this trigger is on

Name: tgenabled
column6: true if trigger is enabled (not presently checked everywhere it should be, so disabling a trigger by setting this false does not work reliably)

Name: tgisconstraint
column6: true if trigger is a ri constraint

Name: tgconstrrelid
column6: the table referenced by an ri constraint

Name: tgnargs
column6: number of argument strings passed to trigger function

Name: tgargs
column6: argument strings to pass to trigger, each null-terminated
